sentences.sContent: Other countries could accede to the deal if they wanted.
sentences.sContent_eng: Other countries could accede to the deal if they wanted.
sentences.sCn: 其他国家如果需要，却可能同意这种开放。

sentences.sContent: The foreign Ministers expressed satisfaction with the latest developments of efforts of some ASEAN countries to accede to the World Trade Organization and support for their early entry.
sentences.sContent_eng: The foreign Ministers expressed satisfaction with the latest developments of efforts of some ASEAN countries to accede to the World Trade Organization and support for their early entry.
sentences.sCn: 外长们对部分东盟国家争取加入世界贸易组织的最新进展感到满意，并支持其早日加入。

remMethod.val: ac + cede(走) → 走到一起 → 同意
